about_the_game:
Step into the nostalgia of the 80s arcades with a modern twist in Quad Blaster! This action-packed shoot 'em up game brings back the excitement of classic arcade machines, but with some unique featrues and gathering the desingn knowledge acqired along the last 30 years, to make the game more accessible while keeping feel of the classic arcades. Get ready for non-stop action as you navigate through waves of enemies and climb your way up the world rankings.

Gameplay Overview:
In Quad Blaster, gameplay takes center stage. With intuitive controls and fast-paced action, you’ll be blasting enemies from all directions. Whether you’re a veteran arcade gamer or new to the genre, Quad Blaster offers a thrilling experience that’s easy to pick up but challenging to master.

Key Features:
Four-Directional Shooting: As an innovative twitst from traditional arcade shooters you have the ability to shoot up, down, left, and right.
Global Leaderboards: Compete against players worldwide and see how you stack up in the global rankings.
Unlimited Attempts: With a single coin, get endless attempts to achieve your highest score possible.
Minimalistic Pixel Art Style: Enjoy a vibrant and broad color palette that pays homage to the classic arcade aesthetics with a modern minimalist touch.

Join the Quad Blaster community today and blast your way to the top of the leaderboards!

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics (Intel HD Graphics 4000 or AMD equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: A small shoot 'em up that combines the charm of retro arcades with innovative gameplay mechanics, delivering a fresh yet familiar experience. A single coin gives you as many attempts as you want to get the world's high score.
